argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | bj-lineq.a | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | bj-lineq.b | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | bj-lineq.x | |- ( ph -> X e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | bj-lineq.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. CC ) |
| 5 |  | bj-lineq.n0 | |- ( ph -> A =/= 0 ) |
| 6 | 1, 3 | #P_mulcld | |- ( ph -> ( A x. X ) e. CC ) |
| 7 | 6, 2, 4 | #P_bj-lsub | |- ( ph -> ( ( ( A x. X ) + B ) = Y <-> ( A x. X ) = ( Y - B ) ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 2 | #P_subcld | |- ( ph -> ( Y - B ) e. CC ) |
| 9 | 1, 3, 8, 5 | #P_bj-rdiv | |- ( ph -> ( ( A x. X ) = ( Y - B ) <-> X = ( ( Y - B ) / A ) ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_bitrd | |- ( ph -> ( ( ( A x. X ) + B ) = Y <-> X = ( ( Y - B ) / A ) ) ) |
